_meanings:
{@--8@} The first syllable of a
reduplicated base, reduplicative
syllable; {#pUrvo'ByAsaH#} <ls>P. VI. 1. 4</ls>; {#atra#}
{#ye dve vihite tayoH pUrvo'ByAsasaMjYaH syAt#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--10@}
(In poetry) Repetition of the
last verses or lines (as of a
chorus); chorus, burden of a
song.

abstraction of
mind resulting from continuous
deep meditation; {#aByAsayogena tato#}
{#mAmicCAptuM DanaMjaya#} <ls>Bg. 12. 9.</ls>

interval caused by the
reduplicative syllable; {# °yepi#} though
separated by this syllable.
